pma:database.name: neogame
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `ingredients` ( `nID` int(4) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `strName` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `strRequiredProps` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `strForbidProps` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`nID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=129 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

table.column: anything except talisman and GUI items

table.column: 4mm Gauss rifle, no scope, no strap
